params.captureAmount: Amount to capture (can be less than hold amount)

params.duration: How long until the hold expires (seconds)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.amount: Amount to pay (in token's base units)

params.deadline: Timestamp after which the signature expires

transferSardis(address).details: Only current Sardis can transfer. Enables platform upgrades and migration.

agent().notice: The agent that owns this wallet

allowMerchant(address).notice: Add a merchant to the allowlist

canPay(address,uint256).notice: Check if a payment would be allowed

dailyLimit().notice: Maximum amount per day (in base units)

denyMerchant(address).notice: Add a merchant to the denylist

getAvailableBalance(address).notice: Get available balance (total balance minus held amounts)

getBalance(address).notice: Get wallet balance for a token

limitPerTx().notice: Maximum amount per transaction (in base units)

pay(address,address,uint256,string).notice: Execute a payment to a merchant

payWithCoSign(address,address,uint256,st.notice: Execute a payment with Sardis co-signature (for higher limits)

removeMerchant(address).notice: Remove a merchant from both lists

setAllowlistMode(bool).notice: Toggle between allowlist and denylist mode

totalHeldAmount(address).notice: Total amount held per token (to prevent over-commitment)

transferSardis(address).notice: Transfer Sardis role to a new address

useAllowlist().notice: Whether to use allowlist mode (true) or denylist mode (false)

usedSignatures(bytes32).notice: Mapping of used signatures to prevent replay attacks
